page.title: 10 A VIEW FROM THE OUTSIDE
page.content: { Newcomers}seem to settle quickly in Ellesmere Port and enjoy the amenities.{A boy from Colchester}felt there was less violence here.He also commented "I have made more friends here".{A person from Belfast}wrote "Primary Schools here are about half the size of the ones back home, so I seem to get to know less people.One of the things I like is the public library system - more libraries and a better selection of books.{Ellesmere {Port has fewer shops}but is smaller than Belfast... people travel in much the same way but there are more bicycles". People living in{Great Sutton and {Little Sutton}think the area is{clean, and like the{open spaces.}A survey of pupils showed that most homes in this area have either a{video recorder, a {computer,}or both.
